scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server && npm run build:npm
scripts.build:client: npm run build:tempClientFiles && npm run build:clientIIFE && npm run build:clientESM && npm run removeClientTempFiles
scripts.build:server: npm run build:tempServerFiles && npm run build:serverIIFE && npm run build:serverESM && npm run removeServerTempFiles
scripts.build:clientIIFE: cat src/Self-host-files/AppMeasurementWindow.js src/Adobe-SDKs/VisitorAPI.js src/Adobe-SDKs/AppMeasurement.js src/AdobeClientSideKit.iife.temp.js > AdobeKit.js; cp AdobeKit.js dist/AdobeClientSideKit.iife.js
scripts.build:serverIIFE: cat src/Self-host-files/AppMeasurementWindow.js src/Adobe-SDKs/VisitorAPI.js src/AdobeServerSideKit.iife.temp.js > AdobeServerSideKit.js; cp AdobeServerSideKit.js dist/AdobeServerSideKit.iife.js
scripts.build:clientESM: cat src/Self-host-files/AppMeasurementWindow.js src/Adobe-SDKs/VisitorAPI.js src/Adobe-SDKs/AppMeasurement.js src/AdobeClientSideKit.esm.temp.js > AdobeKit.js; cp AdobeKit.js dist/AdobeClientSideKit.esm.js
scripts.build:serverESM: cat src/Self-host-files/AppMeasurementWindow.js src/Adobe-SDKs/VisitorAPI.js src/AdobeServerSideKit.esm.temp.js > AdobeServerSideKit.js; cp AdobeServerSideKit.js dist/AdobeServerSideKit.esm.js
scripts.test: npm run testClient && npm run testServer
